description: This table contains the encounter addendum information from the Addendum Added Date (I EPT 18123) and Addendum Added User (I EPT 18129) items.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the items.

columns.name: ADDENDUM_DATE_TIME
columns.description: The date and time when the addendum of the patient encounter is created.

columns.name: ADDENDUM_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the system user who has created the addendum for the patient encounter.

columns.name: ADDENDUM_STARTED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This is the UTC instant when an addendum was started. If blank, then the Addendum Finished Date and Addendum Finished Time (ADDENDUM_DATE_TIME) is the started instant as well as the signed instant.

columns.name: ADDENDUM_STARTED_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user identifier that started the addendum. If blank, then the Addendum Finished User (ADDENDUM_USER_ID) was the user that started the addendum as well as signed it.

columns.name: SOURCE_WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
This is the current platform that is allowed to edit the open addendum. This is only set for open addenda started on Rover. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hyperspace


Text


Web Service


Clarity Console


Home Health


Willow Ambulatory


Epic Studio


Web Suite


Command Builder


Scotty


Rover


Haiku / Canto


Hyperspace Web Standalone / Hyperdrive


Cross Deployment Access Remote Launcher


HSWeb OAuth 2.0 Workflow


Dynamic Data Comparison


Grand Central IVR

columns.name: ADDENDUM_OPEN_YN
columns.description:
Stores whether the addendum is open and has not yet been signed. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
